centiskor.ch

Welcome

Hey! This is centiskor.ch, my hybrid Pokémon fan site and homage to Centiskorch.

I've been heavily inspired by a variety of sites, which you can read more about on my About page.

Pokémon has been my passion since 1998 and, despite a brief lull in the mid-to-late 00s, it's stronger than ever and this site is a manifestation of that obsession.

Anyway, have a great time and enjoy your time here!
